wf_workflow_version.name: Tracy -Prod deployment workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: deployment_state=deploy_prod_progress^EQ
deployment_state=deploy_prod_progress^EQ
deployment_state=pending_prod_deployment^work_notes=Please correct all the preview errors and click on "Deploy to Prod" again^EQ
deployment_state=pending_prod_deployment^work_notes=Please correct all the preview errors and click on "Deploy to Prod" again^EQ
deployment_state=deploy_prod_success^state=3^work_notes=Prod deployment successful^EQ
deployment_state=deploy_prod_success^state=3^work_notes=Prod deployment successful^EQ

wf_activity.name: Wait 1 sec for update to reflect

sys_variable_value.value: 3bf802c20a0a0b52008e2859cd8abcf2

// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

activity.display_value: Wait 1 sec for update to reflect

wf_activity.name: Wait for deployment is a successful or unsuccessful

sys_variable_value.value: deployment_stateINdeploy_prod_success,deploy_prod_failed^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
deployment_stateINdeploy_prod_success,deploy_prod_failed^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

activity.display_value: Wait for deployment is a successful or unsuccessful

sys_variable_value.value: tracy_update_sets_retrieved
tracy_update_sets_retrieved

tracy_update_set_committed

wf_condition.name: Fired
wf_condition.short_description: The event we were waiting on has been fired

sys_variable_value.value: deployment_state=deploy_prod_success^EQ
deployment_state=deploy_prod_success^EQ
